data: Frank Reade, Jr., the inventor of many wonderful machines and whose fame was world wide, sat in his study one day in September looking over a heap of mail matter which the servant had just brought in.

Frank Reade, Jr., with his new steam man in Mexico
or, hot work among the greasers
